StoryText: I go to get a massage at a place and take off my clothes once I'm in the room.
Question: The masseuse enters and says I'm not supposed to take off ALL my clothes. What do I do?

OptionText.Text: Just say I thought this was normal.
Apologize and put my clothes back on.
Apologize, ask to use the bathroom and climb out the window.

OptionResult.Result: The masseuse thinks I'm a pervert and gets the manager and I get thrown out.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: They actually physically throw me out once I get my clothes back on and I am so embarrassed. I wasn't trying to do anything weird I just thought that was normal!

OptionResult.Result: The masseuse forgives me and gives me the massage and it helps me out a lot.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Well, I felt awkward at first but after telling the masseuse it was an honest mistake and apologizing, things were fine. I spent the $50 and got a great massage that I had desperately been needing. I may go back again. I'll keep my clothes on next time though.

OptionResult.Result: After apologizing I use the bathroom and change and run off.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I couldn't bear to stay there after such an embarrassing event. I ran off after I got my clothes back on but I later realized my wallet must have fallen out. So, now I am out one wallet and all $150 I had in there. But there is no way I am ever going back to that place.
